head_office_address: Priory Office Park, 7 Stillorgan Road Blackrock
eu_initiatives:
Joint Task Force on Epilepsy in Europe of the International League Against Epilepsy and the International Bureau for Epilepsy 
Celebration of International Epilepsy Day in Europe 
Support to the European Advocates for Epilepsy ad hoc group in the EU Parliament 
European Reference Network: EpiCARE 
DG Sante supported project: ESBACE
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
To encourage increased EU funding for epilepsy research 
To promote epilepsy awareness initiatives in Europe 
To reduce the stigma associated with epilepsy in Europe 
To improve standards of care for all people with epilepsy in Europe
relevant_communication:
Organisation of International Epilepsy Day 
Sessions at Regional and International Congresses 
Publication of eZines and newsletters 
Workshops in the European Parliament 
Development of a Global Alliance on Epilepsy Research involving agencies in other regions including the US, Canada and Asia
